t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    t -= 1
    data = list(map(int, input().split(' ')))
    n = data[0]
    x = data[1]
    y = data[2]
    center = int((n + 1) / 2)
    xdiff = abs(center - x)
    ydiff = abs(center - y)
    if (xdiff + ydiff) % 2 == 0:
        print('0')
    else:
        print('1')

for tc in range(int(input())):
    (n, x, y) = map(int, input().split())
    xc = (n + 1) // 2
    yc = (n + 1) // 2
    difx = abs(xc - x)
    dify = yc - y
    tdif = difx + dify
    print(tdif % 2)

a = int(input(''))
for i in range(a):
    (N, x, y) = [int(x) for x in input('').split()]
    print((x + y) % 2)

T = int(input())
for _ in range(T):
    (N, x, y) = [int(a) for a in input().split(' ')]
    print(1 if x % 2 == 0 and y % 2 == 1 or (x % 2 == 1 and y % 2 == 0) else 0)

T = int(input())
for _ in range(T):
    (N, x, y) = map(int, input().split())
    print(int((N + 1 - x - y) % 2 == 1))

t = int(input())
while t:
    (n, s_i, s_j) = map(int, input().split())
    (mid_i, mid_j) = (n // 2 + 1, n // 2 + 1)
    diff_i = s_i - mid_i
    (curr_i, curr_j) = (mid_i, s_j + diff_i)
    if (curr_j - mid_j) % 2 == 0:
        print(0)
    else:
        print(1)
    t -= 1

tests = int(input())
for i in range(tests):
    (n, x, y) = map(int, input().split())
    middle = (n + 1) // 2
    x_diff = abs(x - middle)
    y_diff = abs(y - middle)
    minimum = min(x_diff, y_diff)
    steps = x_diff - minimum + y_diff - minimum
    if steps & 1:
        print(1)
    else:
        print(0)

T = int(input())
for i in range(T):
    (N, x_s, y_s) = [int(n) for n in input().split()]
    print(abs(x_s - y_s) % 2)
